column1: * 1917 – J.R.R. Tolkien leaves Brooklands Officers Hospital in Hull for Thirtle Bridge camp.
* 1966 - Actress Mary Elizabeth McGlynn is born.
* 1968 - J.R.R. Tolkien writes Letter to Niall Hoskin.
* 2002 - The PlayStation 2 version of The Lord of the Rings: The Fellowship of the Ring (video game) are released in North America.

column3: travels to Gondolin in order to deliver Ulmos message to Turgon.

column1: ** Glorfindel finds their trail and follows them over the Last Bridge.
